name: BEST WESTERN Key Ambassador Resort Inn

reviews.title: Dirty and Tired
reviews.text: This hotel has a nice location if you like to sleep on the end of a airport runway....sometimes you have to duck your head or the planes will mess your hair. The rooms are like old Motels. The door had a 2" space at the bottom for creatures to crall in. With a swamp behind the hotel....it makes you wonder. The only nice thing about it was the pool setting. The pool was the warmest I've ever been in. But it was dirty. The walls were brown.
They have the sadest breakfast you've ever seen.
reviews.title: Sound insulation companies, apply here!!!

likes.disliked: — not being able to sleep (hearing everyone in every room around you!!!)

reviews.text: We could hear everything and everyone. This hotel is located right next to the airport, at the end of the runway, so expect some LOUD PLANES to wake you up around 6-7 in the morning. If you ask me, I am fine with planes, but THIN WALLS and lack of any SOUND INSULATION drove me NUTS. I could hear every fart from every neighboring room: up above, next one to the left, next on to the right. Some people had babies waking up in the middle of the night, loud as they usually are, obviously waking me and my wife up. But it gets better. Couple next door had issues. They screamed and yelled at each other all night long and we were witnesses to it. We could hear every single word. I did not sleep!!! RUINED MY VACATION!!!
reviews.title: Nice hotel With Excellent Sea View

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only thing that is great is the pool. Nice and big, with bar right next to it. The only downer is that it closes at 8:00pm. So don't plan on these romantic pool-n-bar night time journeys. Family only... (ugh!)
reviews.title: Very Nice Stay

likes.disliked: — far from duvall street, and away from the action

reviews.text: The other thing that I was looking forward to was free continental breakfast. In this case, free breakfast is... well, free!!! It was single worses breakfast in my life. I usually stay at Hampton Inn. Their free breakfast is breathtaking. Key Ambassador had the cheapest stuff out there. A dollar for a gallon orange juice... puke-out coffee... shotty rice-crispies(I can get em anywhere, right?!) and crappy "penny a dozen" pastry. NOTHING BUT A MORNING HEARTBURN. Ruined experience once again...
reviews.title: simply wonderful

likes.disliked: — pool and bar closed too early

reviews.text: The Best Western Key Ambassador hotel was wonderful, when we first arrived we were disappointed with the initial location and what looked like basic motel rooms from the outside, but were pleasantly surprised with our sea view room.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel

likes.liked: — free wireless internet access and large clean room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was the largest hotel room I have ever stayed in, with two large queen beds, plenty of storage, just newly renovated, good quality furniture, a desk for the free high speed wireless internet access for those of you (like us) who may still ahve to work while on holiday with our laptop. The balcony was lovely with very nice furniture as opposed to the usual plastic chairs on balconies and the view was amazing of the Atlantic Ocean.
reviews.title: Wonderful

aka: Best Western Key Ambassador Hotel Key West
description: Located on the straits of Florida of the beautiful island of Key West, Fl. Our resort is only a short distance from the local beaches and just a few miles north of historic downtown. This resort offers non-smoking accommodations and many thoughful amenities. At the Best Western, Key Ambassador resort guest have a variety of views to choose from. There is a spacious outdoor heated swimming pool with 2 waterfalls next to our cheeckie hut that serves food and drink. The resort provides free Wi-Fi throughout the property, a deluxe continental breakfast, complimentary parking and 24 hour front desk services. During your stay you can easily visit many local attractions, unique shops and historic downtown.
